name: Electricity Usage details
query:
select
    site as "TCIL Code",
    udise_code as "UDISE Code",
    site_name as "School Name",
    district as "District",
    block as "Block",
    pin_code as "Pin code",
    school_contact_number as "School Contact",
    school_address as "School Address",
    date as "Date",
    main_meter_previous_reading as "Main meter Previous reading",
    main_meter_current_reading as "Main meter Current Reading",
    previous_meter_reading as "Sub-meter Previous Meter reading",
    meter_reading as "Sub-meter Current Meter reading",
    total_billable_unit as "Total billable Unit",
    price_per_unit as "Price per unit",
    total_bill_amount as "Total Bill Amount",
    quarter as "Quarter",
    payment_date as "Payment Date",
    transaction_id as "Transaction Id"
from `tabElectricity Consumption Record`;
